titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2915) to enhance support and work opportunities for families with children, reduce welfare dependence and control welfare spending.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Tanner. Petition No: 104-14.

bill.summary: 5/6/1996--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2915 (welfare revisions).
